name: Arun Prakash
title: Founder & CEO
about: Arun Prakash, widely known as 'T-Man' for his deep passion for technology, is the Founder & CEO of GUVI Geek Network. With over 20 years of experience in top tech companies like Honeywell, PayPal, Kalido, and Symantec, he has been instrumental in democratizing tech skills globally through GUVI. Under his leadership, GUVI evolved over a decade of dedicated work, inspired by the late co-founder Ms. Sridevi Arunprakash, to become a leading startup in the EdTech industry.
achievements: Led GUVI to achieve two Guinness World Records for AI coding lessons and online programming participation
Invited to Oxford University in 2024 to speak on 'How Vernacular learning is transforming Technology learning'
Recognized as a Youth Icon at the IYONS International Summit
Awarded Leading Social Entrepreneur Award by Action for India in 2019
GUVI awarded 'Most Trusted Vernacular EduTech Award' by ZEE Digital
quote: Technology should be accessible to everyone, regardless of language or background.

name: Kevin Scott
title: Chief Technology Officer
about: Kevin Scott is the CTO at Microsoft, previously Senior VP of Engineering and Operations at LinkedIn where he helped scale the platform significantly.
achievements: Scaled LinkedIn ahead of its IPO
quote: The future of technology is about democratizing opportunity and empowering every person to achieve more.

name: Li Fan
title: Chief Technology Officer
about: Li Fan is a computer scientist and CTO at Circle, previously held senior engineering roles at Google, Baidu, Pinterest, and Lime.
achievements: Led engineering teams at major tech firms
Recognized as one of most important engineers globally
quote: Innovation in financial technology requires both technical excellence and deep understanding of human trust.

name: Sandra "Sandy" Carter
title: Chief Operating Officer
about: Sandy Carter is a businesswoman, speaker, and author. Former GM at IBM and VP at Amazon Web Services; now COO at Unstoppable Domains.
achievements: Held senior roles at IBM and AWS

name: Padmasree Warrior
title: Founder & CEO
about: Padmasree Warrior is a technology executive, formerly CTO at Cisco and Motorola, and CEO of Nio USA. She now leads Fable, a curated reading platform for mental wellness.
achievements: Board member at Microsoft and Spotify
quote: True innovation happens when technology meets human empathy and understanding.

name: Samina Virk
title: U.S. CEO & Chief Marketing Officer
about: Samina Virk serves as both U.S. CEO and CMO of Vestiaire Collective. Her career spans digital agencies, eBay, Target, and scaling luxury-resale operations in the U.S.
achievements: Scaled U.S. business for Vestiaire Collective as CEO and CMO
